The cocktails were very nice, and we spent 2.5 hours here with zero problem. However, when we went to ask the bartender what drink he was making while sitting at the bar, he literally freaked out and gave us a lecture about bothering him. …~One of the best Cocktail places in Stuttgart.
Decent but not snobbish atmosphere.
Fair pricing for superb drinks. Crowd is a mixture of students, boheme and established people. Ring the bell!~One of the.. sorry the best bar experience in the city. A hidden gem, authentic as it can be in the most authentic neighborhood.
Great spot for an intimate date, a classy boys night out or simply a place to go …~Absolutely incredible! The best signature smoky old fashion I have ever drunk.
Elegant, with style, prices €€ lovely atmosphere with Spanish guitar music.
Attention and good service.
What they do is magical.~Used to be a speak easy now you just need to knock. Classy cocktails in what feels to be a hidden part of Stuttgart~Great hidden gem in this city in the style of a speakeasy. Place is cozy, and the staff is extremely friendly. Max behind the bar was helpful and the guys make great cocktails. If you're lucky, you might get Juno playing some music on the open mic, which will make for a great night.~A very good cocktail bar in the heart of the now-hipster red light district as many other cocktail joints.~The place is nice and cozy, but the bar staff was extremely unfriendly, and also rude. No one in the group wanted to go and order the next rounds because the bartender (the bald gentleman with glasses) was almost scary to interact with, so …~The drinks were truly amazing, staff is really competent and friendly, the environment is very relaxed and welcoming .. i just loved this place..~Nice place. Deffinately a hole in the wall.  They did not serve us because they had no seating.  We had 8 in our party, they had 6 customers and could only seat 3 of us.  You can do the math.

FOU FOU | Cocktail- und Champagnerbar.review:
The coctails are awesome. My favorite bar in Stuttgart ❤️~It’s a great cozy bar located in the heart of the old
City of Stuttgart. In fact, it’s placed right on the red light district which gives it a special vibe. The staff is extremely friendly and the owners surely had …~It takes forever to get a cocktail, but the wait is worth it. Cool vibe with three different floors/areas to lounge, dance, hang out. Very popular place, but we luckily found a table with table service. Our server was very friendly and the bartender could shake her drinks!~Cocktails were just amazingly delicious, super friendly service, good atmosphere, care to every detail... I am definitely coming bach there.~I had drinks after dinner with friends, very good cocktails, the barman had a great energy, he was super nice and chatty and help us spend a nice night out! Probably my fav cocktail bar in stuttgart till now!~Delicious drinks, dope beats and good vibes. Best thing though was the bar staff, absolutely beautiful humans inside and out. 11/10 would recommend.~Probably The worst coctail bar that I ever been. I will never forget the attitude and impoliteness.~Nice coktail bar.  Cozy place for weekend or afterwork to have a coktail and enjoy.  Friday and Saturday they have DJ and it is much more crowded. It is friendly to internationals and to groups.  Not romantic but ok for a date...  you have to try it!~For me personally one of the best bars in Stuttgart. Great service with bartenders who take their time to serve you an individualized cocktail - and this always with a smile:-) Great!~YOU CAN'T GET IN BECAUSE YOU DONT HAVE A GIRL WITH YOU! Im really tired of this behaviour. This is what you get in a lot of places in Stuttgart. There was friend of mine visiting from US and started to pour outside. So we decided to stop …

the food here is better than in all the fancy restaurants in stuttgart. yes, you have to eat standing there since it is an imbiss. my advice is to order the food for take away and eat it at home, work or hotel. the people who work there are …~My family and I visited from America in March. Schwarz Wei\u00df Bar.review:
I didn’t order from the menu. The bartender recommended 2 cocktails for me. And it’s exactly what I want. In terms of the cocktails, I give it a 10 out of 10.~The best bar tenders and all staffs with passion and performance, herbs flavors all perfect match and soooooo many special and all flavors covered whiskey collection that so difficult to find in other places. Right place in winter for warm …~Excellent cocktails and the staff is really friendly. The cocktails are phenomenal and the atmosphere of the bar is really cozy, with good jazz playing on the back and low light. Diogo makes really good improvised cocktails, and off the menu I personally recommend the Old Fashioned.~Great atmosphere and friendly qualified bartenders! Cocktails are always tasty and the menu is often updated, so there’s always something new to try. And you can get customized drinks to your own taste anytime, I have to admit that I was amazed once or twice or three times ;)~The best bar for good cocktails and you don't need to know what to order just tell them how you feel and what your taste is. The rest is magic.~Great bar, open late, with helpful and friendly staff and a great selection of whisky!~It’s a really cool place! Tiny space, but lovely people. Their cocktails are fantastic! You should ask the bartender for their specials. Only real downside is that people smoke inside, but I guess that’s also something that makes this bar unique.~I love whiskey so I also love here.

Nice music and surroundings. …~Fantastic Bar in Stuttgart City. Remarkable Cocktails and super Service. I recommend the Cocktail of the Day 😁👍 …~Best Cocktail i had so far in stuttgart. The bar and outside area is always a relaxing places to be...for drinks, friends ....and now Pinsas too.~Cool musical atmosphere with drinks for fair prices. Nova Bar.review: Great place, great food, great people! This is a lovely natural wine bar that offers a cosy and friendly space. The dishes are well curated and the owners know how to diversify them, adapting to the seasons. Sometimes, you will even find guest chefs for a few days!~Awesome place and awesome vibes. There is quality on literally every sense you will experience. Good music for your ear and good tastings from the well curated wine and cuisine menu. An absolut must go in Stuttgart!~If you know the owner I’m sure you will have a good time. If not… well unfortunately you will be treated like that. Be aware that you cannot put your belongings/ coats on the empty stools even if the bar is quiet empty… just in case someone walks in? If you do the service will defo make you feel unwelcome.~Great place! Barkeeper was fun and helpful recommending delicious wine~The place is amazing, keep it going 🤌🏻 …~Top!~Von diesen Locations brauchen wir mehr in Stuttgart! Gute vibes, gute drinks, gutes essen. Man spürt die Liebe zu den Produkten und die Leidenschaft der Hosts für das Konzept.~Grundsätzlich schönes, individuelles Ambiente welches mit toller Musikanlage und Beschallung einlädt. Jedoch Schränken unbequeme Sitzmöbel und ungenügende Freundlichkeit des Gastgebers das Erlebnis stark ein. …~Irgendwie mal was anderes! Ich mags. Nettes Personal, freundliches Publikum. Diverse Weine und eine Liebe zum Essen. Trinkt sich gut und schmeckt. Bin gespannt auf die jungen engagierten Besitzer:innen was sie noch so einfallen lassen. Looking forward!~Kleiner Laden, kleine Drinks. Zielgruppenorientierte Beratung. Wenn man seltsam spezielle Weine und einen leicht überforderten Barmann (für das Standardgeschäft) mag, dann ist die Nova Bar ein Geheimtipp. Spaß hat man aber woanders.

Mos Eisley.review: Friendly staff and nice location. Outdoor seating as well as a second floor. Food is focused on vegetarians - do not expect the satisfaction of a steak House visit here ;-) Food is healthy and prepared well (in stark contrast to other local kitchen..) Need to return to check out the music events!~The food and atmosphere was great, staff was exceptional ❤️~One of the coolest bar and eating place in Stuttgart and the location is just so convenient, just outside the staddmite u bahn towards fritz elias strasse. Prices for food and drinks are reasonable.~Every year Stuttgart Expat Meetups hold their May the 4th be with you Star Wars day party here. Trendy little bar and the upstairs has been developed now too!~Great atmosphere. Enjoyed a beer with friends down stairs. It was a Sunday so the service was a little slow as the bartender was also waiting on tables. The smoke from the club upstairs was noticeable but not too offensive. Id definitely return.~Live music was upstairs, so downstairs was still quiet enough for conversation while enjoying the music. The bartender was fantastic - friendly and made excellent drinks. The Darth Vader painting in the hallway was a great touch.~Nicely decorated bar on the ground floor, good for grabbing a drink and eat something. The music is generally good. On the first floor there's sort of a nightclub, with live music & DJs occasionally. It's a shame that as it's allowed to smoke at the nightclub, it's covered with a stinky cloud of smoke~Went here on May the fourth, had expected more of a Star Wars feel inside but there was not one. However the wild garlic soup was delicious, and I was pleased with the overall atmosphere of this bar/pub.~I love it, I like it , I want it. Nice bar with awesome minimal Techno in a Friday night. Great drink selection and food available what more a man need. One if my favorite I. Stuttgart~They only accept cash. Everything else was good.

ZO'E.review:
Probably  one of the worst experiences in Stuttgart...
We were going to have one cocktail ( decided on a cocktail tour -4-5 different places) just to get a good idea what’s what anymore... …~Profiling against men! Men are not allowed to sit alone, without girls, because men are perverts in their view. This did not happen once but multiple times. And yes it is my fault to go there repeatedly unlearning the manner of their treatment. Never again.~Place to be if you like smoking sisha and people watching~Horrible place, turned away business from 5 men because we didn’t have one girl with us. Lost out on over €200, great way to do business?! This will be another casualty of the high street within 1 year.  Avoid and visit L’Oasis instead. Do not waste your time with this place.~Monday night, went to ZOEs for Shisha with 5 guys, let me clarify it’s a Monday night, we were turned away as we did not have any girls with us. Turning away over €300, that really makes business sense!!! Instead we found L’Oasis who are more then accommodating!~This is a very strange place. After we sat down and ordered and the order came the waiter came and told us we have to change to a table very far away from where we were sitting just because their rules says no two men should not sit alone. This was in the afternoon and we were sitting outside. I never heard of such a rule in my life.~Very good service, nice stuff, good shisha
perfect location near the old town~Is perfect for a evening when you want to have a mix between enjoying a good company but still wanna hear some music like in club. The place is clean and looks good and the service as well~Love their hookah. But not enough servers...usually have to sit and wait 15 minutes or have to chase down a server...especially if its summer and their outdoor seating is open...they need more people serving.~Shisha pipe looks promising but they are usinh strange tobacco so taste is below average in Stuttgart. Do not reccommend if you are seeking for decent pipe.

Prices are lowest in Stuttgart? 🤗
a pub, not stylish cool people, but the real people. Sone singles too. Seems very flexible, and bar staff has time to smile and say some words to all clients. This is cosy athmosphere!! …~it’s nice, complete menu, prices are ok. It really fills up and there’s a lot of cig smoke, if you are sensible to it/don’t like the smoke it’s not the place for you. Nice overall!~An institution in Stuttgart. A melting pot of different audiences who share one desire: One last beer. It's open almost 24/7 and a famous spot for table football. Having entered, you dive into the smoking area. The non-smoking area is …~I did not personally like the place where smoking is allowed inside a closed premise.
It felt like most of the people around the area are coming to this place when all other pubs are closed for after parties...~I was refused entry simply because the security guy said he didn’t trust me because my people come there to cause trouble~Very good ! Almost all the weekends I go with my friends . The place is of different vibe and it has all mixture of people and cultures , specially the staff were good, polite and friendly  :)~If I were a smoker, I would give Oblomow a solid 4 rating.  The bartenders were friendly and attentive.  The crowd seemed pretty relaxed and grounded.  The crowd was diverse in race, age, and walk of life.  As implied, there was a lot of …~Nice decoration. Saturday was a lot of people a bit too much was hard to move.~A friend told me - let's go for a vodka, I will surprise you! Dude, I'm from Poland - I have replied, it will be hard for you to surprise me in this way. How wrong I could be :D A great place. An unusual atmosphere! Please order Ahoj Vodka - a mandatory drink ;)~I had a wonderful night in there with my team. Prices are more than correct if take into account the situation and the hype of the place.

Best shisha in town. The personnel will greet you with charisma and good mood making you feel always welcome.~I think they have an attitude that does not suit human dignity, it is very bad to be exposed to such discrimination, especially in Germany. They choose people according to their clothes and gender. In other words, if you have a stylish br …~Gute Drinks und Shishas. Das besondere ist aber, dass es sich hier nicht um eine weitere klischeehafte Shisha Bar handelt. Wirklich großartiger Service in einem tollen Ambiente und das zu fairen Preisen. Definitiv eine Bereicherung für das eher Hipster-lastige Stuttgart West.~Unglaublich, der ganze Laden ist komplett leer aber der Mitarbeiter erzählt was von notwendiger Reservierung am WE. Sind leider extra auf Empfehlung hin aber keinen Meter wert. Geht lieber gleich ins Zoé oder 327 etc~Echt süßer Laden und das Personal war auch sehr freundlich. Die Shisha war richtig gut! Kann ich weiterempfehlen 👍🏻 …~Sehr schöne authentische Shisha-Bar mit toller Einrichtung. Eine Mischung aus Moderne und Tradition sorgt für eine entspannte Atmosphäre. Leckere Cocktails mit frischen Zutaten sowie ein sehr netter Besitzer und eine hervorragende Shisha.~Eine sehr entspannte Location mit sehr leckeren Coctails. Der wichtigste Punkt meiner Rezession ist natürlich die perfekte Zubereitung der Shisha - 1A.~Sehr schöne Bar mit wunderschön orientalischem Ambiente. Immer wieder gerne zu Besuch, um am Notebook zu arbeiten oder entspannt mit Freunden beisammen zu sein.~Wer dort eine Pide oder etwas Ähnliches zubereiten lässt, hat immer eine Anekdote zu erzählen, von der erstaunlichen Chefin, klein aber wendig oder dem sprachbemühten Mitarbeiter, der sogar "mit allem?" fragt.~10 min auf erste Ansprache durch Bedienung gewartet. Wurden weggeschickt mit der Begründung, dass man reservieren muss.
Abgewiesen trotzt leerem Laden. Es gibt deutlich bessere Alternativen. Reservierung werden nicht mal auf Insta kommuniziert.
